titleStmt.title: SII 4.419: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 419. (A.R. No. 18 of 1891). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE THIRD PRAKARA OF THE JAMBUKESVARA TEMPLE AT TIRUVANAIKKAVAL, TRICHINOPOLY TALUK, TRICHINOPOLY DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . svasti samastabhuvanāśraya śrīpṛdhvivallabha mahārājādhirāja parameśvara dvāraāvatīpuravarādhīśvara yādavakulāmbaradyumaṇi sarvajñacūḍāmaṇi malarājarāja
malaparuḷugaṇḍa kadanapracaṇḍa gaṇḍabheruṇḍa nekāṅgavīra nasahāyaśūra śanivārasiddhi giridurggamalla caladaṅkarāma vairībhakaṇṭhīrava magadharājyanirmmūlana pāṇḍyakulasamuddharaṇa co
ḷarājyapratiṣṭhācārya nissaṅga pratāpacakravartti pośaḷa śrīvirasomiśvaradevarasar Uṭaiyār tiruvāṉaikkāvuṭaiya nāyaṉār koyiṟtāṉattāṟkum Uṭaiyār tiruccirāppaḷḷiuṭaiya
nāyaṉār koyiṟtāṉattāṟkum tiruvāṉaikkāttiruppatiyil nām Eḻuntaruḷivitta Uṭaiyār vallāḷīśvaramuṭaiyārum Uṭaiyār patumaliśvaramuṭaiyārum Uṭaiyār viranāraciṅkiśvaramu
ṭaiyārum Uṭ[aiyār soma]viśvaramuṭaiyārum koyiṟtāṉattāṟkumThe syllables rājarāja are expressed by two symbols.rājarājavaḷanāṭṭuk kaṇṇaṉūrāṉa vikkiramapurattu nām Eḻuntaruḷivitta Uṭaiyār pocaḷiśvara
muṭaiyanāyaṉār koyiltāṉattāṟkum Innāyaṉmāṟku [rājarājavaḷa]nāṭṭu Eṟikaraikkuk kiḻakkut tirumañcaṉapperuvaḻikku meṟku tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyum Itti
ruppatikaḷi ṅ Iṟaiyili ttu viḷai tura ttumkamuku veṭṭuppāḻilum puṉpayiriṉum tiruttiyum kamukum koṭiyum Uḷḷiṭṭu ceyyalām payircceyta nilattu
kkum meṟceyyum nilattukkum ceyta payirkaḷukku Iṟukkum kaṭamai Innāyaṉmārkku tiruvamutu pākkukkum pūcaikkum tiruppaṇikkum Uṭalāka Iraṇṭāvatu mutal Iṟuppārkaḷākac co
ṉṉom Ippaṭiyāl vanta kaṭamai Ivvāṇṭumutal Iṟuppittukkoḷka Itu tevartiru Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 4.419 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
